c74object.name: abc.map.ui
c74object.description: abc.map.ui object lets you use the circle's position, radius and opacity to control processing. Create circles with the 'add' message (with the number of circles as an argument), delete circles with the 'del' message (the numbers of circles to be deleted as a list). This object is compatible with pattrstorage.

method.name: mode
method.description: sets the coordinate format of the circle's position. It can be cartesian or polar

method.name: add
method.description: adds a variable number of circle on the GUI

method.name: del
method.description: if the message 'del' is send without any number, all the circles will be delete. If a list is added (e.g. 'del 1 5'), the corresponding circles will be deteled

method.name: precision
method.description: defines the number of circle printed on the system
method.digest: defines the number of circle printed on the system

method.name: flip_axis
method.description: makes a flip of 90° (anti-clockwise) on the axis
method.digest: makes a flip of 90° (anti-clockwise) on the axis

method.name: set_xy
method.description: defines the cartesian coordinate of [index] point. Usage: "set_xy [index] x y"
method.digest: defines the cartesian coordinate of [index] point. Usage: "set_xy [index] x y"

method.name: set_ad
method.description: defines the polar coordinate of [index] point. Usage: "set_ad [index] azim distance"
method.digest: defines the polar coordinate of [index] point. Usage: "set_ad [index] azim distance"
